# ARC Agent Creator - Implementation Summary

This project is a Next.js application designed to facilitate the creation of ARC-style puzzles via an AI agent.

## Status: Completed

- Scaffolding: Next.js 15+ (App Router), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS.
- Database: Prisma 7 with PostgreSQL (configured with pg adapter for direct connections).
- Components: ARC Grid visualization (0-9 coloring), Puzzle Pair management with resizing.
- Iteration logic: Branching generation history, verbal feedback integration, and grid edit feedback.
- Deployment: README updated with Railway/PostgreSQL instructions.
